name: Lollipop Massacre
description:
Narrative Context

Lollipop massacre is a turn-based arena fighting game. Two players fight between themselves in a fast paced brawl with turns that last only five seconds using a team composed of three characters each with his own unique ability.

Key Features

Think fast: in this fast paced game: you only have five seconds to act!
Build your team: composed by 3 out of 6 characters with unique abilities: find the combination that best suits your playstyle!
Improvise a tactic: The elements of the arena change frequently and in different ways: teleport to reach your enemy or collect items that will recharge your character!
Interesting setting: Fight to the death in arenas made of candies with cute but ruthless characters
